title: Team Eradication Academy LF Dedicated Gold+ prefer plat jungle and support for try outs
body:
We are a Serious team called Team Eradication, Must be gold/Plat to play can get a tryout depending on how you perform we have coaches as well to help you guys improve! Must have reliable Champion Pools. Must main your role your solo q rank will be important in this case considering of the new ranking system. Starters are determined based on showing up for practice and skill at the game, want to move up play better and show up. we also expect you guys to run flex or duo games everyday if you guys are free. must have a mic and ability to take criticism. Fill out the Application below and post on here.
Practice are normally at 7pm EST also Try outs will be going on for 1 week or 2 weeks depending

IGN:
Role:
Solo Rank:
Flex Rank:
Champion Pool:
Team Experience:
Shotcalling 1-10:
Other Information:

Add Jungle Beats on League and ill invite you guys to discord!

replies.body:
IGN: f8bindsall
Role: Support
Solo Rank: G4 and climbing
Flex Rank: none
Champion Pool: While I can play any support, I prefer to play Thresh, Tahm Kench, and Braum as first go tos
Team Experience: played a couple games for a team many years ago
Shotcalling 1-10: going with a 6 but not really applicable due to lack of team play.
Other Information: I am currently trying to earn my way back into platinum. in Season 5 and 6 I made it to platinum 2, however I stopped playing the game in season 7 and in season 8 only decided to attempt for the victorious skin near the end of the season.

IGN: BimBim
Role: Jg/Top
Solo Rank: G3 (Plat last season)
Flex Rank: G3
Champion Pool: Everything. Very flexible player.
Team Experience: Have played in a couple of lone wolf tournaments acting as a sub
Shotcalling 1-10: 8
Other Information: I'm in the Navy, so I know what commitment is, and that's what I'll give the team.

IGN: LegionIceTea
Role: Mid - ADC this season for gaggs.
Solo Rank: Plat 4 60% W/R
Flex Rank: G4
Champion Pool: Everything that can be played mid I play, Yasuo is my highest w/r with 65%+ after 17 games
Team Experience: Played in EU for the National university Esports league for Bristol university. Finished top 8 4 years in a row in an official league comprised of 106 universities across the UK
Shotcalling 1-10: 7
Other Information: Only have one account on NA. 
OP.GG for my other account

https://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=glenroy
